name: Amazon Instant Video
description: Watch thousands of new release movies and TV shows with Amazon Instant Video. Amazon Instant Video offers two great ways to watch movies and TV shows instantly on your Nintendo Wii. Rent or buy from a selection of more than 50,000 titles or subscribe to Prime Instant Video and get unlimited streaming of more than 15,000 movies and TV episodes. Sign up for a one month free trial of Amazon Prime in the Amazon Instant Video app or go to www.amazon.co.uk/watchonwiiu. * This application is available in English and German only.
